word: "So far as possible, let the child from his earliest years be placed where this wonderful lesson book [nature] shall be open before him. Let him behold the glorious scenes painted by the great Master Artist upon the shifting canvas of the heavens, let him become acquainted with the wonders of earth and sea, . . . and in all His works learn of the Creator. In no other way can the foundation of a true education be so firmly and surely laid."--Ed., pp. 100, 101.
